segments.text: Lisa , are there family rules in this house ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I wouldn't call them rules , but there are some things that I expect my daughter to do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Setting the table and doing the dishes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I also expect Cindy to tidy up her own room .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Her room is very neat and clean .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . She's a very responsible person .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will keep my room clean , too . That's a promise .
segments.speaker: S1
